kb.start: Welcome on the ELM Corporation website, I am here to help you.
kb.first_xor: Do you want to proceed with a general guide trough the website or are you interested only in our contacts?
kb.guide: Welcome to the guide of our website, when you are ready tell me it.
kb.home: Welcome to the Homepage of the ELM Corporation website. Here you can find the main areas of the services offered by us.
kb.about: Welcome to the About Us page of the ELM Corporation website. Here you can find all the information about our company.
kb.contact_xor: Do you want to directly contact us through a form or are you interested only in our general contact information?
kb.contact_form: Welcome to the Contact Us page. Now you can fill this form and send it to the company.
kb.contact_page: Welcome to the Contact Us page. Here you can all our contacts.
kb.end: The process is completed. Thank you for your interest!
kb.stay_message: I don't understand. Do you want to continue?
